decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered location plan, Planning and Retail Statement April 2016. Received: 20/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 2 - The premises shall be used for a garden centre only and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class A1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 3 - No more than 50% of the internal floor area of the main garden centre building shall be used for the sale of non-core garden centre goods. For the avoidance of doubt core garden centre goods shall include:
(a) horticultural products, composts, trees (including Christmas trees), plants, shrubs, and flowers of any type
(b) garden and gardening equipment, tools and accessories,
(c) fertilisers and chemicals used in gardening
(d) machinery for garden use and servicing of it,
(e) barbeques and their accessories,
(f) garden/conservatory furniture
(g) wild bird care,
(h) garden ornaments and statuary, baskets and other containers for the growing and display of indoor and outdoor plants and flowers,
(i)  ancillary restaurant, coffee shop and children's play area.

Condition : 4 - No more than 60m2 of the internal floor area of the main garden centre building shall be used for the sale of farm food stuffs, including fruit and vegetables, seasonal, baked, chilled, frozen and ambient goods, beverages and confectionary.
description: Retrospective application for the continued use of the site as garden centre
